contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=223 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map=Route 223-QC.png |established= |length_km=128.6 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 84, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=South |terminus_a={{jct|state=NY|US|11}} at [[Rouses Point, New York|Rouses Point, NY]] |junction={{jct|state=QC|QC|202}} in Notre-Dame-du-Mont-Carmel<br>{{jct|state=QC|A|35|QC|104}} in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu<br>{{jct|state=QC|A|10}} near Chambly<br>{{jct|state=QC|QC|112}} in Carignan<br>{{jct|state=QC|A|20|QC|116|QC|229}} in Beloeil<br>{{jct|state=QC|A|30}} in Sorel-Tracy |direction_b=North |terminus_b={{jct|state=QC|QC|132}} in [[Sorel-Tracy]] |previous_type=QC |previous_route=222 |next_type=QC |next_route=224 }} '''Route 223''' is a north/south highway on the south shore of the [[Richelieu River]]. Its northern terminus is in [[Sorel-Tracy]] at the junction of [[Quebec Route 132|Route 132]] and its southern terminus is close to [[Lacolle, Quebec|Lacolle]], where it crosses the [[Canada–United States border|U.S. border]] at the [[Rouses Point - Lacolle 223 Border Crossing]] and continues into [[New York]] state as [[U.S. Route 11]]. ==Municipalities along Route 223== * [[Notre-Dame-du-Mont-Carmel, Lacolle, Quebec|Notre-Dame-du-Mont-Carmel]] * [[Saint-Paul-de-l'Île-aux-Noix, Quebec|Saint-Paul-de-l'Île-aux-Noix]] * [[Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu]] * [[Chambly, Quebec|Chambly]] * [[Carignan, Quebec|Carignan]] * [[McMasterville, Quebec|McMasterville]] * [[Beloeil, Quebec|Beloeil]] * [[Saint-Marc-sur-Richelieu, Quebec|Saint-Marc-sur-Richelieu]] * [[Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu, Quebec|Saint-Antoine-sur-Richelieu]] * [[Saint-Roch-de-Richelieu, Quebec|Saint-Roch-de-Richelieu]] * [[Sorel-Tracy]] ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.quebec511.gouv.qc.ca/fr/index.asp Interactive Provincial Route Map (Transports Québec)] {{fr icon}} <br> {{Secondary Highways in Quebec (200-series)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|223]] [[Category:Chambly, Quebec]] [[Category:Transport in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu]] [[Category:Transport in Sorel-Tracy]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
